venue.address_1: will be emailed to yes and maybe responses
venue.name: Alisa's House

item.description:
11-11-11 just sounds like a day to celebrate, so we’ve decided to host an informal happy hour on that Friday. Come bring your happy spirits (and your imbibing spirits) and enjoy the company of friends.

 

We’ll have a few appetizers for folks to enjoy. If anyone wants to bring some you are welcome to, but you are also welcome to simply come after work and enjoy good company.

 

Considering a poker party for those who want to hang around after happy hour???? Who knows might be a lucky day!

 

Nothing formal, just friends, laughter and whatever develops….

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Happy Hour and Fun!!
